mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_IMAGE, MEMBER_TYPE, MEMBER_PURPOSE, MEMBER_DISEASE, MEMBER_TIME ) VALUES( MEMBER_SEQ.nextval, #{member_email}, #{member_name}, #{member_image}, #{member_type}, #{member_purpose}, #{member_disease}, #{member_time} )

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_IMAGE, MEMBER_TYPE, MEMBER_TIME, MEMBER_DAY, MEMBER_ACTIVITY_AREA, MEMBER_INFO ) VALUES( MEMBER_SEQ.nextval, #{member_email}, #{member_name}, #{member_image}, #{member_type}, #{member_time}, #{member_day}, #{member_activity_area}, #{member_info} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM review r JOIN matching m ON r.matching_idx = m.matching_idx WHERE m.trainer_idx = #{trainer_idx}

SELECT member_idx, member_email, member_name, member_image, member_status, member_day, member_type, member_time, member_activity_area, member_info, member_info_image FROM member WHERE member_type = 'trainer' AND member_status = 'active'
AND ( member_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR member_activity_area LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
AND member_gender = #{gender}
AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{time}, 1, 5), 'HH24:MI') <= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(member_time, 7, 5), 'HH24:MI') AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{time}, 7, 5), 'HH24:MI') >= TO_DATE(SUBSTR(member_time, 1, 5), 'HH24:MI')
ORDER BY member_idx DESC
